com.birtreport.util

Class ReportRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.birtreport.util.ReportRenderer

  • public class ReportRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for processing the reports and rendering or downloading the reports. It handles the request for rendering the report. The method processReportDesignDocAndRenderReport writes the content in response output stream.

      • processReportDesignDocAndRenderReport

        public void processReportDesignDocAndRenderReport(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        This is overridden method which responsible for processing report i.e .rptdesign document.and also rendering the report.
        It also handles downloading the report.
